last_episode_to_air.name: The Trojan War: Myth or Truth?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Using one of the greatest Greek legends as her treasure map, Megan Fox examines high-tech data and the latest archaeological finds to finally put this enduring question to bed -- Did the infamous Trojan War actually take place?

name: Legends of the Lost With Megan Fox
original_name: Legends of the Lost With Megan Fox
overview: Actress Megan Fox has peeked behind the curtain of some of these ancient sites, igniting an insatiable curiosity to learn more about these lost worlds. She embarks on an epic international journey to investigate and find answers to these enduring mysteries.

episodes.name: Viking Women Warriors
episodes.overview: Megan Fox travels to one of the most mysterious archaeological sites in the world to investigate why our ancient ancestors built this enigmatic monument and if the stones themselves possess supernatural powers.

episodes.name: Stonehenge: The Healing Stones
episodes.overview: Megan Fox travels to one of the most mysterious archaeological sites in the world to investigate why our ancient ancestors built this enigmatic monument and if the stones themselves possess supernatural powers.

episodes.name: America's Lost Civilization
episodes.overview: New archaeological findings show that humans may have arrived in America as far back as 48,000 BC; Megan Fox examines the theory that these early settlers were gigantic prehistoric versions of homo sapiens.

episodes.name: The Trojan War: Myth or Truth?
episodes.overview: Using one of the greatest Greek legends as her treasure map, Megan Fox examines high-tech data and the latest archaeological finds to finally put this enduring question to bed -- Did the infamous Trojan War actually take place?
